authors.author: Fishlegs Ingerman
authors.bio: DTM's resident biologist and human interest writer, Fishlegs is a household name among the dragon-science crowd.

authors.author: Phlegma the Fierce
authors.bio: Growing up on a farm, Phlegma always dreamed of life beyond the isle of Berk. As DTM's head travel writer, she now gets to travel the world finding exploring new places.

authors.author: Spitelout Jorgenson
authors.bio: Dragon trapper turned dragon trainer, Spitelout Jorgenson knows more about dragon sports than most people know about their own hand.
